p: The key enzymes inhibition activity of the extracts against tyrosinase, and α-amylase were measured using the protocols as published by [ 35]. The enzyme inhibition abilities were evaluated by IC 50 values. IC 50 values calculated as antioxidant assays and we used a graph between concentration and percentage of enzyme inhibition. Standard enzyme inhibitors (Kojic acid (KAE) for tyrosinase and acarbose (ACE) for α-amylase) were used as positive control and also, the results were expressed as equivalents of these standards. The details for experimental methods are given in the Supplementary Materials.
